languages.text: "Вообще-то у нас в планах отступление. Ладно мятежники, но против рвущегося в этот мир варпа мы бессильны — это факт". {n}Соломон сплевывает кровь.{/n} "Конкретно этот бой нам навязали — пришлось отгонять еретиков от терминала, пока машинные духи не закончат передачу данных на наш шаттл".

"Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out a mouthful of blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."
languages.original_text: "Вообще-то у нас в планах отступление. Ладно мятежники, но против рвущегося в этот мир варпа мы бессильны — это факт". {n}Соломон сплевывает кровь.{/n} "Конкретно этот бой нам навязали — пришлось отгонять еретиков от терминала, пока машинные духи не закончат передачу данных на наш шаттл".

traits.locale_text: "Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."

"Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out a mouthful of blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."

languages.text: "Eigentlich haben wir vor, uns zurückzuziehen. Die Rebellen sind eine Sache, aber gegen den eindringenden Warp können wir nichts tun, so viel steht fest." {n}Solomorne spuckt etwas Blut aus.{/n} "Diese Schlacht wurde uns aufgezwungen ... wir mussten die Ketzer vom Terminal fernhalten, bis die Maschinengeister die Daten auf unser Shuttle übertragen hatten."
languages.original_text: "Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out a mouthful of blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."

traits.locale_text: "Eigentlich haben wir vor, uns zurückzuziehen. Die Rebellen sind eine Sache, aber gegen den eindringenden Warp können wir nichts tun, so viel steht fest." {n}Solomorne spuckt etwas Blut aus.{/n} "Diese Schlacht wurde uns aufgezwungen ... wir mussten die Ketzer vom Terminal fernhalten, bis die Maschinengeister die Daten auf unser Shuttle übertragen hatten."

languages.text: « Notre plan est en réalité de nous replier. Les rebelles sont une chose, mais nous sommes impuissants à repousser une intrusion du Warp. {n}Solomorne crache une gerbe de sang.{/n} Ce combat nous a été imposé. Il nous a fallu tenir les hérétiques à bonne distance du terminal jusqu'à ce que les esprits de la machine aient fini de transférer les données à notre navette. »
languages.original_text: "Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out a mouthful of blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."

traits.locale_text: « Notre plan est en réalité de nous replier. Les rebelles sont une chose, mais nous sommes impuissants à repousser une intrusion du Warp. {n}Solomorne crache une gerbe de sang.{/n} Ce combat nous a été imposé. Il nous a fallu tenir les hérétiques à bonne distance du terminal jusqu'à ce que les esprits de la machine aient fini de transférer les données à notre navette. »

languages.text: «En realidad nuestro plan consiste en retirarnos. Los rebeldes no suponen un problema, pero no tenemos nada que hacer contra la disformidad que se está abriendo paso». {n}Solomorne lanza un escupitajo de sangre.{/n} «Este combate ha sido más que nada una necesidad: teníamos que mantener a los herejes lejos del terminal hasta que los espíritus máquina terminasen de transferir los datos a nuestra lanzadera».
languages.original_text: "Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out a mouthful of blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."

traits.locale_text: «En realidad nuestro plan consiste en retirarnos. Los rebeldes no suponen un problema, pero no tenemos nada que hacer contra la disformidad que se está abriendo paso». {n}Solomorne lanza un escupitajo de sangre.{/n} «Este combate ha sido más que nada una necesidad: teníamos que mantener a los herejes lejos del terminal hasta que los espíritus máquina terminasen de transferir los datos a nuestra lanzadera».

languages.text: “老实说，我们现在正打算撤退。虽然叛乱分子我们能处理，但亚空间的入侵我们无能为力，这是事实。”{n}索罗蒙啐了一口鲜血。{/n}“刚刚那场仗，我们不得不打。我们必须阻止那些异端分子靠近码头，坚持到机魂把所有数据传输到我们的穿梭机上为止。”
languages.original_text: "Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out a mouthful of blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，我们现在正打算撤退。虽然叛乱分子我们能处理，但亚空间的入侵我们无能为力，这是事实。”{n}索罗蒙啐了一口鲜血。{/n}“刚刚那场仗，我们不得不打。我们必须阻止那些异端分子靠近码头，坚持到机魂把所有数据传输到我们的穿梭机上为止。”

languages.text: 「実のところ、私たちの作戦は撤退することです。反乱軍どもならまだしも、〈歪み〉の侵蝕はどうしようもありません―これは紛れもない事実です」{n}ソロモーンは血の混じった唾を吐き出した。{/n}「この戦いは、私たちに強いられたものです。異端者どもがターミナルに近づかぬよう、機械精霊が転送を終えるまで守り抜くしかなかったんです」
languages.original_text: "Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out a mouthful of blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."

traits.locale_text: 「実のところ、私たちの作戦は撤退することです。反乱軍どもならまだしも、〈歪み〉の侵蝕はどうしようもありません―これは紛れもない事実です」{n}ソロモーンは血の混じった唾を吐き出した。{/n}「この戦いは、私たちに強いられたものです。異端者どもがターミナルに近づかぬよう、機械精霊が転送を終えるまで守り抜くしかなかったんです」

languages.text: "Aslında geri çekilmek niyetindeydik. İsyancıların aksine öteboyuta karşı mücadele edemeyiz. Bu bir gerçek." {n}Solomorne, bir ağız dolusu kan tükürüyor.{/n} "Savaşmak zorunda kaldık. Makine ruhları veriyi mekiğimize aktarmayı bitirene dek kâfirleri terminalden uzak tutmak zorundaydık."
languages.original_text: "Actually, our plan is to retreat. The rebels are one thing, but there is nothing we can do against the warp forcing its way in, and that's a fact." {n}Solomorne spits out a mouthful of blood.{/n} "This battle was forced on us — we had to keep the heretics away from the terminal until the machine spirits finished transferring the data to our shuttle."

traits.locale_text: "Aslında geri çekilmek niyetindeydik. İsyancıların aksine öteboyuta karşı mücadele edemeyiz. Bu bir gerçek." {n}Solomorne, bir ağız dolusu kan tükürüyor.{/n} "Savaşmak zorunda kaldık. Makine ruhları veriyi mekiğimize aktarmayı bitirene dek kâfirleri terminalden uzak tutmak zorundaydık."
